mapper.insert: insert into business_pay_fee_detail( operate,prime_rate,detail_id, receivable_amount,cycles,remark, received_amount,community_id,b_id,fee_id,state) values ( #{operate},#{primeRate},#{detailId},#{receivableAmount}, #{cycles},#{remark},#{receivedAmount},#{communityId},#{bId},#{feeId},#{state})
